## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G07750](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G07750)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RRP42</u>
- **Gene Name:** ribosomal RNA processing 42
- **Description:**   3-5-exoribonuclease family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2077522
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_101771]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;IPMS1 mutants grew somewhat slower and had undulated leaves that tended to be slightly chlorotic. Showed an increase in the content of the aliphatic amino acid Val.
